column1: .@Perduesenate is right! Democrats have spent the last three years trying to overturn the 2016 election. It's time to end the partisan games and get Congress back to work! #gapol https://t.co/xPUfDZfLJw
Great way to cap off the week! Proud of @GovKemp and @gdecd for their hard work! #gapol https://t.co/f7z8Tepkpn

Today grassroots conservatives across Georgia are participating in Trump Victory’s National Day of Action. Truly appreciate all the volunteers who are working so hard to secure a BIG win for @realDonaldTrump & Republicans up and down the ballot! #ndoa #LeadRight #gapol https://t.co/T0MjISArH5

ICYMI: "Kelly is an unapologetic conservative who is proud to support President Trump and his efforts to build a safer stronger and more prosperous country." Check out our debut campaign ad here: https://t.co/vGy9iKpNrT

I am humbled to serve as one of @TeamTrump's Honorary State Chairwomen & look forward to telling America's success story to voters throughout Georgia.   Together we will secure victory at the ballot box & champion policies that Keep America Great! #gapol  https://t.co/IBzpBQPOPZ

While I've only been in Washington for a couple of weeks it's abundantly clear that impeachment is a partisan exercise to undermine @realDonaldTrump and his agenda. It's time to end the taxpayer funded political games and get Congress back to work for the American people. #gapol https://t.co/bHs5PPT5tk

Earlier today I was proud to support final passage of #USMCA in the U.S. Senate. Thanks to President Trump's bold and steadfast leadership we will have a free - and fair - trade deal that will grow jobs strengthen communities and keep our state and country strong! #USMCAwin

By signing a historic trade deal with China @realDonaldTrump is making good on another promise that will keep our state and country growing. I'm so proud of our President for his leadership and commitment to free - and fair - trade! https://t.co/Od4dnlsVln #gapol

#DemDebate made it clear that while our 2 parties disagree on policy we differ far more on principle. The American Dream will die if our country is led by radicals who dismiss the value of hard work & individual responsibility in favor of oppressive gov't & progressive ideology.

It's a sad day in Washington D.C. when Democrats refuse to condemn the murder of innocent men women and children. We should stand together against evil and support those who seek freedom.https://t.co/mHQGVYIo5q #gapol

Thanks to @realDonaldTrump 's pro-growth pro-jobs policies every  metro area in the U.S. is experiencing economic prosperity. On the Ag Committee I'll work to ensure that our rural communities and farm towns are strong and prosperous too! https://t.co/Qluzrmi6Pg #gapol

Brave & courageous are not strong enough words to describe survivors of sex trafficking. Their incredible testimony to @IvankaTrump @GovKemp & @GAFirstLady  underscores the urgent need to protect Georgians from this unimaginable abuse & uplift those on the journey to recovery. https://t.co/5kRnwhRP7x

Grateful for @IvankaTrump and @GAFirstLady for leading the fight against human trafficking in our state and country. By raising awareness and educating the public we can protect innocent children and end this evil industry.  https://t.co/QHFBH9Vrv8 #gapol

Thank you @GAFirstLAdy @GovKemp and @Georgia_AG for working so hard to fight human trafficking! #gapol https://t.co/8wZ2nL2fDz

Just picked up my @Kia Telluride! So impressed with their operation in West Point and look forward to driving  this #GeorgiaMade vehicle throughout the Peach State! #gapol https://t.co/zyGUkK2SA0
Thank you @GAFirstLady for leading efforts to stop human trafficking in our state and beyond. RT to help raise awareness! #gapol #HumanTraffickingAwarenessDay https://t.co/JBdUuv2Crb
After a successful first week in Washington I’m back in Georgia. Big thanks to the @FultonGOP for the warm welcome this morning. Stay tuned for more updates! #gapol #gagop https://t.co/DKRxr6KnpY

Great way to end the week! 👏 https://t.co/sd2gh4aBcX #gapol

Let's move past this partisan sideshow and get back to work for the American people! #gapol https://t.co/9sOew2F89n

Georgians can rest assured knowing my pro-life views support of the President and conservative values will be reflected in my work in the Senate. https://t.co/mbiy7fTRpW #gapol

Today I was proud to co-sponsor three pro-life bills (S. 109 S. 130 S. 160) that will protect the innocent unborn and promote a culture of life in our country. As a devout Christian I know that every life has value. Every life is a blessing from God. #gapol #ProLife https://t.co/a90O6gT94s

Historic week in Washington! Now my focus is on working with @realDonaldTrump and my colleagues in the Senate to keep our country safe strong and prosperous! https://t.co/8i0kY9asc7 #gapol
This is great news as we work to secure the border and keep our families safe! #gapol https://t.co/4OruJJKOJa

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for drawing a REAL red line against terrorism the countries who sponsor it and those who do us harm. It is our duty to protect our people our freedom and our way of life. (2 of 2) #gapol

Today I backed Sen. @tedcruz 's resolution that applauds @realDonaldTrump for eradicating Qassem Soleimani. The world can sleep better knowing this evil terrorist is dead. #gapol https://t.co/Yq5M3tQUG5

.@AustinScottGA08: "I'd like to congratulate Kelly Loeffler on her appointment to the U.S. Senate. I look forward to working with her  to support our military installations Georgia farmers and rural communities and especially President Trump." #gapol

Speaker Pro Tempore @JanJonesGA : "I am excited that Governor Kemp has appointed Kelly Loeffler to fill Senator Isakson's seat. Her extensive business experience and conservative principles will serve Georgia well in the U.S. Senate." #gapol

.@GaRepublicans : “She has a noteworthy record of business and community leadership and a long history of supporting the Republican Party. I was impressed with her speech and encouraged by her remarks supporting President Trump.” #gapol
Thanks for the kind words. Together we will Keep America Great! https://t.co/hNPLTgj8Zx
Thank you Senator! https://t.co/I4TtiTTE0k

Comm. John King: " Like me Kelly Loeffler is an outsider to politics with a passion to serve our state defend our values and fight on behalf of Georgians. Together we will work side by side to keep Georgia safe and strong." #gapol

.@JohnnyIsakson: “The same tireless work ethic that has helped her succeed in business will also help her succeed in serving Georgians and our nation...I will work closely with Kelly to ensure a smooth transition.” #gapol

Comm. Mark Butler: "I fully support Gov. Kemp's decision to appoint Kelly Loeffler as our next U.S. Senator. It's rare that someone of her diverse background and real-world experience offers themselves for public service. She'll bring much-needed common sense to D.C." #gapol

.@RepLoudermilk : "I look forward to working with Kelly Loeffler as the new U.S. Senator. Our delegation is known for unity and collaboration between its members in both chambers and we will continue to work hard on the issues Georgians care about." #gapol

Senate President Pro Tempore Butch Miller: "Kelly Loeffler is a strong businesswoman w/ solid conservative values who will make Georgia proud as our next U.S. Senator. She is the right person for this historic appointment and I look forward to working with her..." #gapol

.@ColeMuzio: "I have vetted and had the opportunity to speak with Kelly Loeffler. And I am confident when I tell you something you will soon see – this appointment is a big win for Georgia conservatives." https://t.co/rBZBKG1jXz #gapol
